description: This file serves as a command-line interface (CLI) for initializing various software project types, parsing command-line arguments, creating project configurations, and invoking project initialization logic. It includes functions for parsing parameters, converting templates to dictionaries, and executing the main program flow with argument parsing and output formatting.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] parse_parameters(params_str: str)
methods.description: Parses a comma-separated string of key=value pairs into a dictionary with correctly typed values.

methods.name: ProjectConfig create_project_config(args)
methods.description: Creates a ProjectConfig object from CLI arguments, converting parameters string into a dictionary.

methods.name: str make_path_absolute(path: str, base_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts a relative path into an absolute path based on a provided base directory.

methods.name: dict template_init_info_to_dict(init_info: TemplateInitInfo, project_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts a TemplateInitInfo object into a dictionary, resolving file paths to absolute paths for JSON serialization.

methods.name: output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
methods.description: Outputs a standardized JSON-formatted response indicating success or failure and associated data.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Entry point that handles argument parsing, project template creation, initialization, and output formatting.

ctags.name: output_json
ctags.pattern: /^def output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_pat/
ctags.signature: (success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
